farmcity.controller

Class ManageInventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.controller.ManageInventoryController

  • public class ManageInventoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages Inventory functions such as buying seeds and gifting to other players

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManageInventoryController()
      This class manages harvest crop, plant crop functions as well as player's process of leveling up

    • Method Summary

      This method return all of the player's available Crop

      This method allows a user to purchase bag(s) of seeds of Crop(s) from the Shop.

      This method allows a player to send bag(s) of seeds as gift(s) to his friend(s).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManageInventoryController

        public ManageInventoryController()
                          throws CityException
        This class manages harvest crop, plant crop functions as well as player's process of leveling up
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • sendGifts

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Character> sendGifts(java.lang.String username,
                                                                         Crop selectedCrop,
                                                                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Character> giftNames)
                                                                  throws CityException
        This method allows a player to send bag(s) of seeds as gift(s) to his friend(s). This will add one bag of seeds of the particular Crop that the Player chose to his/ her friend(s)' inventory and deduct the same amount of bag(s) of seeds of the Crop in his/ her own inventory
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the current player
        selectedCrop - The Crop that player wishes to send to his friend(s)
        giftNames - the HashMap that keeps track of list of friends that the Player has sent gift(s) to
        Returns:
        the updated HashMap giftNames after the gift(s) have been successfully sent to his friend(s)
        Throws:
        CityException - if the necessary files to initialise the application cannot be found, throws CityException

      • giftStatusUpdate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> giftStatusUpdate(java.lang.String username)
                                             throws CityException
        This method checks the status of a player's gifting (whether he can send gift to his friend(s)) at the time when the user choose the Gift function in his Inventory
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the Player that chooses to send a Gift
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of Player which represents friends that this Player cannot send Gift to
        Throws:
        CityException - if the necessary files to initialise the application cannot be found, throws CityException

      • purchaseCrop

        public void purchaseCrop(Player player,
                         Crop crop,
                         int quantity)
                  throws CityException
        This method allows a user to purchase bag(s) of seeds of Crop(s) from the Shop. If the purchase is successful, add the amount of bag(s) of seeds of Crop(s) to the player's inventory and deduct (price of Crop * number of bags of seeds purchased) Gold from the player's gold
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who chooses to Buy in Shop Menu
        crop - the Crop that player chose to purchase
        quantity - the number of bag(s) of seeds that the Player choose to purchase
        Throws:
        CityException - if the player doesn't have enough gold to purchase the specified number of bag(s) of seeds of the particular Crop

      • getAllCrops

        public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getAllCrops()
        This method return all of the player's available Crop
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of Crop that player has in his/ her inventory
